mapper.sql: id, industry_id, proposal_name, customer_id, customer_name, `desc`, purpose_id,purpose_col1,purpose_col2, purpose_col3, version, theme_id,pic_id
mapper.select: select a.id, a.industry_id, a.proposal_name, a.customer_id, a.customer_name, a.desc, a.purpose_id,a.purpose_col1,a.purpose_col2, a.purpose_col3, a.version, a.theme_id,a.pic_id,b.url from h_advertising_proposal a left join h_pic_video b on a.pic_id = b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into h_advertising_proposal (id, industry_id, proposal_name, customer_id, customer_name, `desc`,purpose_id,purpose_col1 purpose_col2, purpose_col3, version, theme_id,pic_id creater_id, create_time, updater_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proposalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purposeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purposeCol1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purposeCol2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purposeCol3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{themeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update h_advertising_proposal
industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
proposal_name = #{proposalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose_id = #{purposeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
purpose_col1 = #{purposeCol1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose_col2 = #{purposeCol2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purpose_col3 = #{purposeCol3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
theme_id = #{themeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pic_id = #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update h_advertising_proposal set industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, proposal_name = #{proposalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose_id = #{purposeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purpose_col1 = #{purposeCol1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose_col2 = #{purposeCol2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose_col3 = #{purposeCol3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},theme_id = #{themeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},pic_id = #{picId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
